INcludes the images to burn on your DVDs and the front and back cover from the box.  Sah-sweet and thank you!

The movie is PAL 720x576 with High Density 50 frames per sec. (suitable for slow motions)
But I am accustomed to the 720p or 1080p versions.
The movie looks a bit grainy (may be PAL requires stretched pixels than square pixels! No idea)
I believe this movie is more suitable for TV.

Second disk is awesome!
